name: The Flesh God
description:
The Flesh God is an action platformer where you shoot a massive gun to fly through hundreds of levels infested with deadly mutant flesh.You shoot, everything flies
The Earth has been devoured by a massive mass of meat and you are the one left to defeat it. Run and shoot to survive and kill your enemies in this action-packed game. Shoot down to fly up, shoot left to dash right. You are the gunner.One tool – multiple usesYou shoot, and that’s all you need.
Shoot to launch yourself across the level, shoot to kill your enemies and shoot to live another day. The gun is used to convey all the movement and action through easy to learn but hard to master controls.
Deadly platforming levelsAlong the game you’ll upgrade your gun with more shoots before reloading, which will allow you to perform amazing acrobatics to beat the hardcore platforming levels. And just when you think you’re safe… A truck-sized monster appears running to eat you.Dark and twisted worldWho are you?
Why are you fighting?
Pray to The Flesh God and die.
